New Records: This will be the first World Series featuring five MVPs: the Dodgers' Ohtani, Freeman and Mookie Betts, and the Yankees' Aaron Judge and Giancarlo Stanton.
This is the first World Series with a pair of 50-home run hitters in Judge (58) and Ohtani (54).
Key Match Events: No specific key match events were mentioned in the article.
Pre-Game Insights: Players practiced in 85-degree weather as the sun highlighted Dodger Stadium's sky blue, yellow, light orange and sea foam green seats.
Freddie Freeman, slowed by a bad ankle, insisted he will be in the lineup for the opener.
Post-Match Reflections: No specific post-match reflections were mentioned in the article.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This figures to be the first World Series featuring five MVPs: the Dodgers' Ohtani, Freeman and Mookie Betts, and the Yankees' Aaron Judge and Giancarlo Stanton.
In an age of expanding playoffs, this is just the fifth World Series since the Wild Card Era started in 1995 involving the teams with the best records in each league.
Others: The Dodgers are seeking their eighth title and second in five years, while the Yankees are in the World Series for the first time since winning No. 27 in 2009.
Aaron Boone, Dave Roberts have faced each other since April 3, 1992, when Roberts' UCLA Bruins beat Boone's Southern California Trojans' 11-1 UCLA's Jackie Robinson Stadium.
